net.canarymod.api.world.blocks

Interface Block


  • public interface Block
    IBlockAccess wrapper with added position and world information.
    Author:
    Chris (damagefitler), Jason (darkdiplomat)

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean canApply(BlockProperty property)
      Checks if a given BlockProperty can be applied to the block

        status

        Returns:

        Returns:
        the damage

      • getQuantityDropped

        @Deprecated
int getQuantityDropped()
        Deprecated. moving to BlockBase
        Gets the amount that would be dropped when the Block is harvested.
        NOTE: Some blocks are random on the amount so returns may differ for those each call
        Returns:
        the quantity that would be dropped

      • dropBlockAsItem

        void dropBlockAsItem(boolean remove)
        Drops the Block into the world as an EntityItem
        Parameters:
        remove - true to replace the block with air; false to leave the block as is

      • getTileEntity

        TileEntity getTileEntity()
        Gets a TileEntity at the same location as the Block
        Returns:
        TileEntity at the location or null if none

      • rightClick

        boolean rightClick(Player player)
        Simulates a right click on the block.
        Useful for forcing changes to blocks like levers, buttons, doors, etc...
        Parameters:
        player - the Player to use with activation. Can be null
        Returns:
        true if the Block responded; false if not

      • sendUpdateToPlayers

        void sendUpdateToPlayers(Player... players)
        Sends the update packet to the specified Player(s) without modifying the world.
        Useful for displaying things like borders to a specific player(s)
        Parameters:
        players - the Player(s) to send info to

      • getBlockPacket

        BlockChangePacket getBlockPacket()
        Gets a BlockChangePacket of the Block that would be used in an update
        Returns:
        the BlockChangePacket of the Block

      • getPropertyForName

        BlockProperty getPropertyForName(java.lang.String name)
        Gets the BlockProperty for the given name
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the property
        Returns:
        the associated BlockProperty or null if no property found

        Gets the value of a given BlockProperty

        the value of the property

      • setPropertyValue

        void setPropertyValue(BlockProperty property,
                      java.lang.Comparable value)
        Sets a given property on a block. NOTE: New properties are not supported.
        Parameters:
        property - the property to set
        value - the value to set
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - should an invalid Property or value attempted to be set

        Parameters:
        property - the property to set
        value - the value to set
        Throws:

        value - the value to set

        Returns:

      • stateToString

        java.lang.String stateToString()
        Returns the Mojang string of the BlockState implementation
        If any properties are applied to a state, they are serialized in the returned string
        Returns:
        state to String
